subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4880 is on the way
description_text:
Hi

I have not received part of my order, can you advise how much longer it will be?

My Pedals have arrived but still waiting on the haptic motors

Order number - #SSN4880


Kind regards,
Chris

conversations.body_text: Hi Christopher Geraghty,     The tracking information shows that the vibration motor has been delivered. If you experience interference issues with the pedals, please install the VAM Pro motor using nylon screws and nylon spacers. This helps electrically isolate the VAM Pro from the mounting bracket, preventing interference with the pedals.
